name: StickyBuddy
description:
This is just a prototype of the game. Contact us for more information at https://www.facebook.com/StickyBuddyStudio.

--- Setup Guide ---

1.Install controller_02.apk in your mobile phone. ( as a controller )

2.Just download and extract NSC2020_StickyBuddy.rar  to your computer!

--- How to play ---

1.Open NSC2020_1.exe in extracted file.

2.Connect your computer and mobile phone with the same network. ( lan connection )

3.Open your controller app and choose player.

4.Having Fun!
